documents.document: “Whether or not you write well, write bravely.” ~Bill Stout #GQ #courage #quote
Big thanks for your quotes! Keep them coming. I’m loving them and soon will everyone else as well :)
“There are two kinds of statistics: the kind you look up and the kind you make up.” ~Rex Stout #GQ #statistics #quote
@danielleraexx You sent me 13 quotes! Thank you :)
“A fairly bright boy is far more intelligent and far better company than the average adult.” ~J. B. S. Haldane #GQ #quote
“Stop the habit of wishful thinking and start the habit of thoughtful wishes.” ~Mary Martin #GQ #habits #life #quote
“The only cure for grief is action.” ~George Henry Lewes #GQ #happiness #life #quote
Keep your favourite quotes coming @Good_Quotes. You’ve already sent me some great ones! Special thanks to @Jenn_Chinn for four quotes :)
Whoa, that Elizabeth Kenny #quote just broke all the previous retweet numbers, hands down. Thank you beautiful people! :)
“He who angers you conquers you.” ~Elizabeth Kenny #GQ #life #quote
Is there a #quote that has helped you through a rough spot? Please reply with @Good_Quotes and share it with everyone.
Wow, what a response. Thank you everyone. Please keep the quotes coming!
“If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirt.” ~Francis Picabia #GQ #ideas #quote
Well, I’m off for tonight. Keep the beautiful quotes coming. Make sure you use @Good_Quotes instead of DM, it’s a mess in there :) See you!
@just1heather Delete all you want, it’s already saved locally, complete with timestamps and everything. My sincerest apologies ;P
@just1heather It’s the rules. Stop fighting the rules! “Just surrender and it won’t hurt at all” ;)
@just1heather Thank you for sharing, but you can’t really escape the chance of receiving an invite. Sorry :)
@iHollyXOXO Which bit? I’ll be happy to elaborate if needed :)
That’s it. Nothing more, nothing less, but make it personal. Something that really means a lot to you. I’m really looking forward to this!
Send this week @Good_Quotes a quote that means a lot to you. I will RT it and you’ll be among the ones that will get a #GoogleWave invite.
What’s your favourite quote of all time? Is there a quote that has especially helped or inspired you? Now’s the chance to share it… #quote
Unfortunately I don’t have enough invitations to give to everyone who wants one, so here’s my idea…
Right. The Google Wave invitation. Would you want one?
“Always tell the truth—it’s the easiest thing to remember.” ~David Mamet #GQ #life #quote
“We thought that we had the answers, but it was the questions we had wrong.” ~Bono #GQ #life #quote #red
“Music can change the world because it can change people.” ~Bono #GQ #music #quote #red
“Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.” ~Shirley Chisholm #GQ #life #quote
“When you’ve seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there.” ~George Harrison #GQ #life #quote
“If you neglect your work, you will dislike it, if you do it well, you will enjoy it.” ~Sir Philip Sidney #GQ #attitude #quote
“Statistics are used much like a drunk uses a lamppost: for support, not illumination.” ~Vincent ‘Vin’ Scully #GQ #quote
@just1heather Right. “Hubby’s side” :P
“Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.” ~Cary Grant #GQ #quote
“Courage is one step ahead of fear.” ~Coleman Young #GQ #courage #quote
“Fame is a vapor, popularity an accident, and riches take wings. Only one thing endures and that is character.” ~Horace Greeley #GQ #quote
@just1heather “Awake.” ~Heather :) #quote
“To receive everything, one must open one’s hands and give.” ~Taisen Deshimaru #GQ #life #quote
“To be ignorant of one’s ignorance is the malady of the ignorant.” ~Amos Bronson Alcott #GQ #quote
“Men can starve from a lack of self-realization as much as they can from a lack of bread.” ~Richard Wright #GQ #life #quote
A bunch of spammers dropped. Let me know if you feel I’ve misjudged you. Also make sure you check your DM. Only validated users from now on.
“You are today where your thoughts have brought you. You will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you.” ~James Allen #GQ #life #quote
“An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.” ~Friedrich Engels #GQ #action #quote
“When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.” ~Jimi Hendrix #GQ #love #quote
“If we don’t change, we don’t grow. If we don’t grow, we are not really living.” ~Gail Sheehy #GQ #growth #life #quote
Something rather big came up, and I missed the #FollowFriday thanks. Please accept my apologies. Will try to make it up in the coming days.
“When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.” ~Charles A. Beard #GQ #mindset #quote
To thank everyone individually, which I want to, would take 10+ tweets and you wouldn’t feel so special. How would you prefer to be thanked?
It’s time for the #FollowFriday gratitude, but you guys have been such awesome retweeters this week, I’m not sure what to do… :)
“The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.” ~Ashley Montagu #life #quote
“It is not wise to be wiser than is necessary.” ~Philippe Quinault #GQ #wisdom #quote
“All you need is love, but a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt.” ~Charles M. Schulz #GQ #love #quote
“I’ve got a new invention: it’s a revolving bowl for tired goldfish.” ~Louis ‘Lefty’ Gomez #GQ #quotes
“If is difficult to get a man to understand something when his salary depends upon his not understanding it.” ~Upton Sinclair Jr. #quote
“You explore concepts and things that interest you, but you are also exploring inside of yourself.” ~Ed Paschke #life #quote
Big thanks to all of you for your retweets and comments. I’ll leave you tonight with a good life quote. See you tomorrow :)
“Inventing is a combination of brains and materials. The more brains you use, the less material you need.” ~Charles F. Kettering #quote
@amandamary It’s OK I’m watching them too! I mean the muppets. Everyone should do that right now (HD video) http://cli.gs/muppets-br :)
“Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? Caught in a landslide. No escape from reality…” ~Mercury #lyrics #bohemianrhapsody
“Beauty is power, a smile is its sword.” ~John Ray #GQ #smile #quote
A future classic quote? You’ve got to love it when your editorial notes get left in. Check the beginning http://cli.gs/8c-editor-fail :)
“The robbed that smiles steals something from the thief.” ~William Shakespeare #GQ #smile #quote
“A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.” ~Joseph ‘Joe’ DiMaggio #GQ #leadership #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Some days you’re not sure if life will go on, but I’m alive now, so I guess it could be worse. I appreciate your concern.
“Cats seem to go on the principle that it never does any harm to ask for what you want.” ~Joseph Wood Krutch #GQ #quote
“A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.” ~Phyllis Diller #GQ #smile #quote
Thank you for your beautiful retweets. You have helped me survive my excruciating day. Thank you so much.
“Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.” ~Mark Twain #GQ #smile #quote
I’m implementing a fairly strict DM spam policy starting now. One spam link will get you sacked. It’s enough. But I do it with a smile :)
“A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.” ~Denis Waitley #GQ #smile #quote
“A man isn’t poor if he can still laugh.” ~Raymond Hitchcock #GQ #attitude #quote
“In order to act, you must be somewhat insane. A reasonably sensible man is satisfied with thinking.” ~Georges Clemenceau #GQ #quote
@IloveTwilightBR Obrigado! That’s very kind of you. Thank you so much for that sunbeam! :)
“You’re never fully dressed without a smile.” ~Martin Charnin #GQ #smile #quote :)
“Amateurs hope, professionals work.” ~Garson Kanin #GQ #professional #quote
“I want to live, I want to grow, I want to see, I want to know, I want to share what I can give, I want to be, I want to live” ~Denver #mm
“I’m starting with the man in the mirror, I’m asking him to change his ways…” ~Michael Jackson #lyrics #musicmonday #mj
RT @SWAT_Institute: "Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." ~ Anais Nin
“And how I wish that there were more, than 24 hours in a day…” ~Elvis / Doc Pomus / Mort Shuman #lyrics #musicmonday
“And now I’ve found, that the world is round, and of course it rains every day” ~Barry / Robin / Maurice Gibb #lyrics #musicmonday
…and while this may be true, you are the one and only you” ~Chesney Hawkes / Nik Kershaw #lyrics #musicmonday #90s
“No one can be myself like I can, for this job I’m the best man…
@oOoOoBarracuda Really glad you’re liking them! Big thanks for your RTs :)
“There are two kinds of men, those who love and create, and those who hate and destroy.” ~Manuel Fraga Iribarne #life #quote
“A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.” ~Billie Jean King #GQ #winning #quote
“I love the winning, I can take the losing, but most of all I love to play.” ~Boris Becker #GQ #attitude #quote
“All of us do not have equal talents, but all of us should have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.” ~J. F. Kennedy #GQ #quote
“If we had been greater, circumstance would have been less strong against us.” ~George Eliot #GQ #greatness #quote
“The more I like me, the less I want to pretend to be other people.” ~Jamie Lee Curtis #GQ #mindset #quote
@just1heather Thank you Heather! A lot of special gratitude flowing your way :)
“A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.” ~Donna Roberts #quote Thanks for singing along.
Today marks the one month anniversary of @Good_Quotes and I am handing out 1222 thank yous. I feel honored. Thank you, each individually.
“I cannot imagine how the clockwork of the universe can exist without a clockmaker.” ~Voltaire #GQ #quote
“Break open a cherry tree and there are no flowers, but the spring breeze brings forth myriad blossoms.” ~Ikkyū #GQ #life #quote
“Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned.” ~Harold ‘Hal’ Geneen #GQ #leadership #quote
“Popularity is not leadership.” ~Richard ‘Dick’ Marcinko #GQ #leadership #quote
“Losing doesn’t eat at me the way it used to. I just get ready for the next play, the next game, the next season.” ~Troy Aikman #GQ #quote
“I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.” ~Goldie Hawn #GQ #kindness #quote
“Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist.” ~René Magritte #GQ #art #life #quote
Btw, I shan’t take an ‘iq test’ nor do I mind the concept of paying for teeth whitening, but thank you for asking. Very considerate of you.
“We must not only give what we have, we must also give what we are.” ~Désiré-Joseph Mercier #GQ #life #quote
“The first wealth is health.” ~Ralph Waldo Emerson #GQ #health #life #quote
